attributes.action: Bring Back Corporal Punishment in Schools and Scrap Human Rights Laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bring about the return to discipline in schools. which this country is so sadly lacking.  repeal human rights legislation and put back the rights to the law abiding, not the criminals the watchword should be break the law loose your rights full stop no exceptions...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
